sentence.text: Segregation analysis of heterozygous variants, related to hearing loss, identified by whole exome sequencing in the child (protein homooligomerization: c.1159TAAAAC, establishment of epithelial cell apical/basal polarity: c.313GAAAAC, and GPR98: c.18746TAAAAG) excluded them from being responsible for the hearing loss in the proposita.

entity.text: establishment of epithelial cell apical/basal polarity

sentence.text: Therefore, we conclude that the novel splice-site variant identified in extracellular matrix organization is the most likely cause for Steel syndrome in this family and that the hearing loss is part of this syndrome*s phenotype
